"U.S. consumers today want products that are personalized, embody their ethics and values, and are authentic"

Zenzi's mission is to use psychology and data science to create more effective marketing campaigns. According to Gallup Research, the vast majority of customer buying decisions are influenced by emotional factors. Therefore, uncovering the psychological needs of your customers can radically improve the customer experience (and your bottom line).  Speaking to values is our mission at Zenzi, and the central credo of the Values Marketing movement.Our methodology includes:UNCOVERING VALUESActive listening and data analysis to uncover trends and insights that lead to a better understanding of how and why your customers make decisions. Strategic recommendations on how to communicate more effectively to achieve lasting impact on your business.Research and consumer insights reportsStrategic planning: Integrated marketingSituation analysis and competitive benchmarkingKey messages for customers, influencers and stakeholdersSPEAKING TO VALUESCreative, timely, relevant marketing strategies that tap into your audiences' values. Provide an ongoing flow of compelling resources to grow your audience and keep them engaged and motivated.Social media editorial strategyBlog and website strategy and copywritingPress releases and marketing collateralVideo and photo assets
Zenzi Forms First Values Marketing Agency
Zenzi Forms First Values Marketing Agency

The Entrepreneurs’ Organization (EO) is a global, peer-to-peer network of more than 11,000+ influential business owners with 155 chapters in 48 countries. Founded in 1987, EO is the catalyst that enables leading entrepreneurs to learn and grow, leading to greater success in business and beyond.

The Keep A Breast Foundation™ is a 501 (c) (3) non-profit organization. Our mission is to help eradicate breast cancer by exposing young people to methods of prevention, early detection and support. Through art events, educational programs and fundraising efforts, we seek to increase breast cancer awareness among young people so they are better equipped to make choices and develop habits that will benefit their long-term health and well-being.

The U.S. Green Chamber of Commerce represents the voice of hundreds of thousands of small, midsized and large American businesses and global corporations who understand that…--Business success and sustainability go hand-in-hand--Shareholder value and social consciousness co-exist side-by-side--Long-term business profits, global leadership and environmental stewardship are inseparable from each other.

September 19, 2016, Sarah was senior to Dylan but didn’t manage directly

I've had the pleasure of working closely with Sarah on a handful of projects and clients in 2016, and it has always (and all ways) truly been a pleasure. Sarah is a brilliant blend of professional and playful, strategic and creative, fun-loving and no-nonsense. She excels at communicating direction from the client side to the creative side, and her strategic chops help ensure that all work produced by Zenzi will not only resonate emotionally and personally, but also move the needle and sell product. Sarah has built Zenzi into a really cool, smart, dynamic and fun creative + strategic shop, and I'm honored to have had a chance to work with her and her team. She's Awesome! Check her and Zenzi out if you're looking to promote, grow and share your brand and its message.

Web Development Consultant
March 9, 2015, Sarah managed Ben directly

I have worked with dozens of web developers in the past, and I am so happy we found Ben! He is extremely easy to work with, responsive, flexible and (most importantly!) he gets the job done. He has both the backend technical skills and the ability to creatively execute, which is a rare combination. He has no problem advising from a strategic level or rolling up his sleeves and doing the coding himself. Ben's work ethic and high quality of service has made him a valuable asset to our team at Zenzi.

summary: I'm the founder of Zenzi and a pioneer in the Values Marketing movement. I believe in digging deep, living with purpose and blazing a new trail. I get excited about the intersection of data science, psychology and marketing.  I'm passionate about understanding the WHY behind customer purchase decisions. Since 2002, I've helped shape marketing strategies for leaders in consumer goods, technology, cannabis, real estate, politics and more.
